MTL_expressions.description: Driving speeds for different vehicle lanes of an expressway are indicated

propositions.description: Speeds for different lanes are indicated
assumptions: Speed indications are explicit and easily noticeable

MTL_expressions.description: The maximum speed does not exceed 120 kilometers per hour

propositions.description: Maximum speed is not more than 120km/h
assumptions: Expressway has clear speed limit indications

MTL_expressions.description: The minimum speed is not lower than 60 kilometers per hour

propositions.description: Minimum speed is not less than 60km/h
assumptions: Expressway has clear speed limit indications

MTL_expressions.description: The minimum speed for the left lane is 100 kilometers per hour, when there are two vehicle lanes

propositions.description: Minimum speed for left lane is 100km/h if two lanes
assumptions: Expressway has clear lane markings and indications

MTL_expressions.description: The minimum speed for the farthest left lane is 110 kilometers per hour and 90 kilometers per hour for the middle lane, when there are three or more lanes

propositions.description: Minimum speed for farthest left lane is 110km/h and for the middle lane is 90km/h, if three or more lanes
assumptions: Expressway has clear lane markings and indications

MTL_expressions.description: Motor vehicles should comply with the speed limit signs, even if they contradict speed limits stated above

propositions.description: Vehicles should comply with actual speed limit signs
assumptions: Speed limit signs are clear and easily readable
Motor vehicles are capable of adjusting speed to comply with different speed limits
